about_the_game:
Shuuen Shoujo is a thrilling action RPG featuring VTubers Sakuya and Tsumugi, who operate in the virtual space of Unreally. One day, Sakuya is selected as a beta tester for the latest game, Shuuen Shoujo, and she dives into its world alongside Tsumugi. This post-apocalyptic world is devoid of people and overrun with monsters. Together, they use their unique powers to fight back against the darkness and guide the World Tree towards its rebirth.

Gameplay
Stylish Action
'Shuuen Shoujo' offers players a wide array of action-packed maneuvers. Use these actions to battle your foes:

Step: Evade enemy attacks and move swiftly.
Jump: Reach higher grounds and leap over enemies.
Grappling Hook: Move quickly and attack distant foes.
Pod Shooting: Suppress enemies from a distance with your pod.
Prosperity System
Collect materials from monsters and rebuild the city to strengthen your stats. This prosperity system is crucial for advancing in the game:

Material Collection: Defeat monsters to gather materials.
City Restoration: Use the collected materials to restore the city and enhance your stats.
Stat Enhancement: As the city is restored, your abilities improve.
Diverse Monsters
The game features over 10 unique monsters. Additionally, there are 100-monster and 1,000-monster defeat missions for those who love a challenge. Enjoy plenty of content to keep you engaged.

Story Mode
Explore the world of Shuuen Shoujo and relive the adventures of Sakuya and Tsumugi. Watch as their friendship and growth unfold while surviving in the post-apocalyptic world.

Shuuen Shoujo is packed with an epic storyline, diverse actions, and numerous challenges. Join Sakuya and Tsumugi on their journey to save the world!
